item.title: Paramedic and police officer seriously hurt while attending crash
item.description: Three men are arrested after a paramedic and an officer attending an earlier crash were seriously hurt.

item.title: Man dies after tree falls onto caravan during Storm Goretti
item.description: Police say a man in his 50s died in the incident in Helston during Storm Goretti.

item.title: TV psychologist on inspiring Prince Naseem film
item.description: A new movie starring Pierce Brosnan reveals the bond between Prince Naseem Hamed and his trainer.

item.title: Non-league Macclesfield stun FA Cup holders Crystal Palace
item.description: Sixth-tier Macclesfield FC beat reigning champions Crystal Palace. With 117 places between the teams, it's the biggest upset in FA Cup history.

item.title: Video emerges of Minneapolis shooting filmed by ICE agent who opened fire
item.description: The clip shows the moments before gunfire rang out on a Minneapolis street.
